attributes.title: AWFUL MY INFORMATION WAS STOLEN
attributes.review: this app took an unacceptable time to download and when it finally did it asked for permission to access EVERYTHING in my phone. Simply ridiculous!

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Asked for all my info and proceeded to harass me with emails texts and notifications. The president wants to boost his Cheeto-ego by gaining support through an app that harasses its users. Do not recommend to any sane American citizen.

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: This app does not glorify god in any way, shape or form.  The man that this app represents should be in jail and go to therapy. Like truly. That’s not something against therapy, I’m a psychologist.  He would benefit from therapy.

attributes.title: Terrible app.
attributes.review:
First off this app is disgusting. I was asked for my phone number and personal information. 
 Don’t download this app. 
 This app is terrible.

attributes.title: THREAT TO NATIONAL SECURITY!
attributes.review: guy BE CAREFUL when downloading this app! my phone was wiped clean after downloading, and all of my information was sent to china ☹️☹️☹️ very very bad!! on a real note, if you support bunker boy in 2020, you’re a white supremacist.

attributes.title: DISGUST  I GOT CORONA VIRUS
attributes.review: It literally made my grandma get corona virus and my fish died right after I downloaded it! It’s not good the fat Cheeto ruined my life he killed my fish this ain’t a good app please delete this it’s trash periodt I said what u said 🤷‍♀️🙄🙄🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Worse app ever😤😤

attributes.title: Laggin like the prez himself
